verses.verse: And <WG2532> he showed<WG1166> me<WG3427> a<WG2513> river<WG4215> of water<WG5204> of life<WG2222>, bright<WG2986> as<WG5613> crystal<WG2930>, proceeding<WG1607> out of<WG1537> the throne<WG2362> of God<WG2316> and<WG2532> of the Lamb<WG721>,

in <WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the street<WG4113> thereof<WG846>. And<WG2532> on this<WG2532> side<WG1782> of the river<WG4215> and on that<WG1782> was the tree<WG3586> of life<WG2222>, bearing<WG4160> twelve<WG1427> manner of fruits<WG2590>, yielding<WG591> its<WG846> fruit<WG2590> <WG1520> <WG1538> every<WG2596> month<WG3376>: and<WG2532> the leaves<WG5444> of the tree<WG3586> were for<WG1519> the healing<WG2322> of the nations<WG1484>.

And <WG2532> there shall be<WG2071> no<WG3756> curse<WG2652> any<WG3956> more<WG2089>: and<WG2532> the throne<WG2362> of God<WG2316> and<WG2532> of the Lamb<WG721> shall be<WG2071> therein<WG846>: <WG1722> and<WG2532> his<WG846> servants<WG1401> shall serve<WG3000> him<WG846>;
and <WG2532> they shall see<WG3700> his<WG846> face<WG4383>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> name<WG3686> shall be on<WG1909> their<WG846> foreheads<WG3359>.

And <WG2532> there<WG1563> shall be<WG2071> night<WG3571> no<WG3756> more<WG2532>; and they<WG2192> need<WG5532> no<WG3756> light of lamp<WG3088>, neither<WG2532> light<WG5457> of sun<WG2246>; for<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> shall give<WG5461> them<WG846> light<WG5461>: and<WG2532> they shall reign<WG936> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>.

And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto me<WG3427>, These<WG3778> words<WG3056> are faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> true<WG228>: and<WG2532> the Lord<WG2962>, the God<WG2316> of the spirits<WG40> of the prophets<WG4396>, sent<WG649> his<WG846> angels<WG32> to show<WG1166> unto his<WG846> servants<WG1401> the things which<WG3739> must<WG1163> <WG1722> shortly<WG5034> come to pass<WG1096>.
And behold<WG2400>, I come<WG2064> quickly<WG5035>. Blessed<WG3107> is he<WG3588> that keepeth<WG5083> the words<WG3056> of the prophecy<WG4394> of this<WG5127> book<WG975>.

And <WG2532> I<WG1473> John<WG2491> am he that heard<WG191> and<WG2532> saw<WG991> these things<WG5023>. And<WG2532> when<WG3753> I heard<WG191> and<WG2532> saw<WG991>, I fell down<WG4098> to worship<WG4352> before<WG1715> the feet<WG4228> of the angel<WG32> that showed<WG1166> me<WG3427> these things<WG5023>.

And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, See<WG3708> thou do it not<WG3361>: <WG1063> I am<WG1510> a<WG4675> fellow-servant<WG4889> with thee and<WG2532> with thy<WG4675> brethren<WG80> the prophets<WG4396>, and<WG2532> with them that keep<WG5083> the words<WG3056> of this<WG5127> book<WG975>: worship<WG4352> God<WG2316>.

And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Seal<WG4972> not<WG3361> up the words<WG3056> of the prophecy<WG4394> of this<WG5127> book<WG975>; for<WG3754> the time<WG2540> is<WG2076> at hand<WG1451>.

He that is unrighteous<WG91>, let him do unrighteousness<WG91> still<WG2089>: and<WG2532> he that is filthy<WG4510>, let him be made filthy<WG4510> still<WG2089>: and<WG2532> he that is righteous<WG1342>, let him do righteousness<WG1344> still<WG2089>: and<WG2532> he that is holy<WG40>, let him be made holy<WG37> still<WG2089>.

<WG2532> Behold<WG2400>, I come<WG2064> quickly<WG5035>; and<WG2532> my<WG3450> reward<WG3408> is with<WG3326> me<WG1700>, to render<WG591> to each man<WG1538> according as<WG5613> his<WG846> work<WG2041> is<WG2071>.
I <WG1473> am<WG1510> the Alpha<WG1> and<WG2532> the Omega<WG5598>, the first<WG4413> and<WG2532> the last<WG2078>, the beginning<WG746> and<WG2532> the end<WG5056>.

Blessed <WG3107> are they<WG3588> that wash<WG4160> their<WG846> robes<WG1785>, that<WG2443> they<WG846> may have<WG2071> the right<WG1849> to come to<WG1909> the tree<WG3586> of life<WG2222>, and<WG2532> may enter in<WG1525> by the gates<WG4440> into<WG1519> the city<WG4172>.

<WG1161> Without<WG1854> are the dogs<WG2965>, and<WG2532> the sorcerers<WG5333>, and<WG2532> the fornicators<WG4205>, and<WG2532> the murderers<WG5406>, and<WG2532> the idolaters<WG1496>, and<WG2532> every one<WG3956> that loveth<WG5368> and<WG2532> maketh<WG4160> a lie<WG5579>.

I <WG1473> Jesus<WG2424> have sent<WG3992> mine<WG3450> angel<WG32> to testify<WG3140> unto you<WG5213> these things<WG5023> for<WG1909> the churches<WG1577>. I<WG1473> am<WG1510> the root<WG4491> and<WG2532> the offspring<WG1085> of David<WG1138>, the bright<WG2986>, the<WG2532> morning<WG3720> star<WG792>.

And <WG2532> the Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> the bride<WG3565> say<WG3004>, Come<WG2064>. And<WG2532> he that heareth<WG191>, let him say<WG2036>, Come<WG2064>. And<WG2532> he that is athirst<WG1372>, let him come<WG2064>: <WG2532> he that will<WG2309>, let him take<WG2983> the water<WG5204> of life<WG2222> freely<WG1432>.

<WG1063> I testify<WG4828> unto every man<WG3956> that heareth<WG191> the words<WG3056> of the prophecy<WG4394> of this<WG5127> book<WG975>, if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> shall add<WG2007> unto<WG4314> them<WG5023>, God<WG2316> shall add<WG2007> unto<WG1909> him<WG846> the plagues<WG4127> which are written<WG1125> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> book<WG975>:

and <WG2532> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> shall take away<WG851> from<WG575> the words<WG3056> of the book<WG976> of this<WG5129> prophecy<WG4394>, God<WG2316> shall take away<WG851> his<WG846> part<WG3313> from<WG575> the tree<WG976> of life<WG2222>, and<WG2532> out<WG575> of<WG1537> the holy<WG40> city<WG4172>, which are written<WG1125> in<WG1722> this<WG5026> book<WG975>.
He who<WG3588> testifieth<WG3140> these things<WG5023> saith<WG3004>, Yea<WG3483>: I come<WG2064> quickly<WG5035>. Amen<WG281>: <WG3483> come<WG2064>, Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>.
The grace<WG5485> of the<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> <WG5547> be with<WG3326> the<WG3956> saints<WG5216>. Amen<WG281>.
